attributes.action: Instruct the Police and CPS to investigate and prosecute MPs who have made fraudulent expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public apologies, poor accounting practices or ignorance of the law does not exempt anyone from prosecution.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
